overview: Akaash is looking for love, and has arrived in America in search of an all-American, but still Indian, girl. Visiting with, Rohit, his childhood friend, Akaash asks for his help to find his dream girl. Yet, as Akaash goes from girl to girl--simple situations often leading to hilarious outcomes--he begins to realize that finding love is never easy and no girl is what she seems.
title: Dulhan, Made in USA
